snippet.title: Cursed Mansion Trailer December 2020
snippet.description:
Lead a girl who suddenly got her live in danger by getting locked in inside a mansion full of mystery. Find a way out, search clues and key items, but also keep her safe. Watch around every corners because someone or something might take her life away.

Cursed Mansion takes place in a mansion deep inside a forest. The protagonist, tried to seek shelter from a stormy weather, stumbled upon a mansion. However, the mansion seemed to be empty, and the protagonist proceeded to enter the mansion only to find out the front door suddenly got locked by itself. Confused on what actually happened, the protagonist tried to find anyone inside the mansion. The thing she discovered was traces that there was something vicious happening inside the mansion. Little did she know, she's just uncovered something malignant that lurks inside the mansion.
---
itch.io: https://dragonemperors.itch.io/cursedmansion
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/967120/Cursed_Mansion/
